data.title: Nice Treat
data.text: My family enjoys treating ourselves to Marble Slab even though we could get a TON more ice cream if we just hit a local grocery store. It's just sometimes it fun to do something different. We have always had a good experience at this Marble Slab location while vacationing nearby.

data.title: Employees don't care
data.text:
Unfortunately, first impressions are lasting and we won't return.  I feel bad the owner has employees that don't care about customers and more concerned about playing on their cell phones. Teens couldn't be bothered to finish ringing in our transaction.      Seemed annoyed we ordered ice cream.  

After shopping at neighboring stores, I could see employees hanging out in back room laughing up a storm.    Not how I would run my business.

data.title: Kind of Expensive
data.text: The ice cream was great, but not worth 4.50 for a small with no toppings. The staff was friendly and service was quick. The tables and chairs could have used a cleaning as they we re sticky and gross. I'm going with 3 stars....4 for the ice cream... a minus 1 for the cleanliness of the place.

data.title: Delicious and quick!
data.text: This ice cream is fresh and delicious with loads of extras if you like.  There are many toppings and dipped and candy coated cones.  It was a very short wait, as there were several servers making it a quick trip!  Love it!

data.title: My favorite Ice Cream place
data.text: Ok, so what if this place is near my house, and close to a work place. I just love their ice cream. My favorites are Dark Chocolate Malt, or Sweet Cream ice cream with either rasberries or cookie dough. They are always friendly, good service and with their rewards program, I get $5 off frequently.

data.title: Great ice cream !
data.text: We went here twice during our visit, it gets busy after dinner hours . One of our party wanted to go every day just to get a shake .

data.title: Perfect
data.text:
My husband and I had a couple of the suggested flavor mixes, although I can't remember the names. One was Reese cups, Reese Pieces, peanut butter in chocolate ice cream in a Butterfinger dipped cone. YUM! The other was Pecans, Caramel, chocolate chips in a Vanilla ice cream. Deelish!!
No pics--we ate it too fast!

data.title: I love this place
data.text: I like their ice cream a lot because I can get it any way I want it.  Okay, it's not cheap at all, but it is good and you have LOTS of toppings to choose from.  Don't think I'd make it a habit, but when we feel like going out for an ice cream in the evening, this is where we go.

data.title: Kid in a Candy Store!!
data.text: Great fun, great ice cream flavors, and great topping and add-ons. Service was quick, helpful and a lot of fun. Pick your ice cream flavor, add your toppings and watch them mix it all together for your eating enjoyment, in a cup, waffle cone, sugar cone, plain cone, coated cone, just too many choices. If there was one of these near home I'd weigh 450 pounds!!

data.title: Great product but the staff!?!?!?!!!
data.text: The restrooms were horrible, and the rest of the place looked iffy. The staff was terrible.  But the Coup De Gras was what followed.  There was A young Asian girl with several small Asian children with that she was trying to buy ice cream for, (a handful).  I overheard the young black teenager that was waiting on me say to his co-worker that he had never seen so many "Chinks" in one place.  With all of the racial tension these days, I thought it a very offensive from someone who you would think would have more sensitivity towards racial slurs. We will not return

data.title: Dark Chocolate -- yum!
data.text: A treat due to price but excellent ice cream and topping choices.  We ended up going in the back of Marble Slab Creamery which we thought was the front.  Parking is a little awkward.  Not too many places to sit and eat.   You have to buy a bottle of water unless you want a cup and use the water fountain.

data.title: Great ice cream!
data.text: Standard marble slab.  Great ice cream with lots of options.   Great treat on a super hot summer night. Convenient location!

data.title: We can't stay away
data.text: We've been here on vacation for less than a week and we've already been here twice.  We will probably go a third time before we leave.  The milkshakes and ice cream we have had have been absolutely delightful.  They have a very creative menu as well.  Additionally, the young guy working the cash register is pretty funny and he and the other staff do an excellent job.

data.title: Great ice cream and Wonderful Service
data.text: Our family of 15 descended on a slow Sunday afternoon.  There were 5-6 people in front of us (have visited when much busier and more staff available).  The lone employee (very young) didn't panic at all.  I highly commend him for his patience and perseverance in getting the job done well.  He didn't rush trying to get through, but handled each person as if they were the only one in the store.  We were almost through when another employee appeared to help out.  The ice cream is really good.  They have a great selection of cones and flavors.  Prices are reasonable.  Seating inside is limited, but there are a few outside tables as well.  Will be back when in area again.

data.title: Really Can't Go Wrong
data.text: I had the cheesecake with pecans and caramel.   Wife had vanilla with sprinkles and the boys had vanilla with oreo.  It's consistently good and the staff was friendly at this location.

data.title: Good like all of these creameries
data.text: We had our taste of summer here after a day at the beach in November.  The service was fine and the ice-cream was delicious.  Serving is big for the price and any toppings come with the price.

data.title: Love it
data.text: What can I say great ice cream great toppings, the only down side is for some reason the changed the temperature of the ice cream so when you get it, you better eat it fast or you will be drinking it.  This is different from last year.

data.title: A lota money for ice cream!!
data.text: Kinda pricey ice cream!! Ordered 2 cones and it cost me $15!! Didn't get too many extras!! The volume of ice cream is ok, the extras are expensive.

data.title: Never Disappoints
data.text: Marble Slab always has the best ice cream.  They are a little pricey but always worth it. There were 5 of us in our group and all of us tried something different.  The service was excellent.

data.title: Great customer service and ice cream
data.text: This Marble Slab has the best customer service in Mt. Pleasant.  The ice cream is a little pricey, but the options and quality are worth it.  They also have a customer loyalty program.  The staff reminds me at my visits and I eventually get free ice cream.
